mapper.insert: insert into role (role_id, role_name, role_createtime, role_createman, role_messagestatus, role_wroksstatus, role_bannerstatus, role_studiostatus, role_secpotstatus, role_roadstatus, account_status, role_spare, role_portfolio) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleCreateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleMessagestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleWroksstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleBannerstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleStudiostatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleSecpotstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleRoadstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rolePortfolio,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_createtime = #{roleCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, role_createman = #{roleCreateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_messagestatus = #{roleMessagestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_wroksstatus = #{roleWroksstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_bannerstatus = #{roleBannerstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_studiostatus = #{roleStudiostatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_secpotstatus = #{roleSecpotstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_roadstatus = #{roleRoadstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_status = #{accountStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_spare = #{roleSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_portfolio = #{rolePortfolio,jdbcType=INTEGER} where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, role_createtime, role_createman, role_messagestatus, role_wroksstatus, role_bannerstatus, role_studiostatus, role_secpotstatus, role_roadstatus, account_status, role_spare, role_portfolio from role where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by role_createtime desc

select role_id, role_name, role_createtime, role_createman, role_messagestatus, role_wroksstatus, role_bannerstatus, role_studiostatus, role_secpotstatus, role_roadstatus, account_status, role_spare, role_portfolio from role order by role_createtime desc

select role_id, role_name, role_createtime, role_createman, role_messagestatus, role_wroksstatus, role_bannerstatus, role_studiostatus, role_secpotstatus, role_roadstatus, account_status, role_spare, role_portfolio from role where role_name like "%"#{roleName}"%" order by role_createtime desc
